name: Humans must die!
description:
This game was made for our very first GameJam( GamesPlusJam 3 ) under 48 hours!

Camera Movement
  • W-A-S-D(or use the arrow keys) to move your camera
  • Scroll Wheel to zoom in and out
Gameplay

This is a production line tower defense game. In order to keep those pesky humans away from your home you decided to resort to violence.

The goal of the game is to survive as long as you can, building  (mimic?)watchtowers, wizard towers, hanging cages to strike fear in their hearts.

On the other hand due to lacking resources you must gather wood, stone, and ... people to create rune stones and javelins for the towers to hurl at the hummies.

Credits Teammates

Firstly, a special thanks to my teammates, they did a great job on making this game! :) My teammates:
MKing33: programming, building descriptions
Phaeron01: music, 3D modelling, animations
ItsRed96: sprites and model painting
berzii: programming
